channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-5037] HashFunction is not intialized in SyntheticOptions
item.description:
This is due to fact that the field is transient hence not getting serialized and then initialized again after deserialization. We need some other way of initializing it, immune to the field's transiency.

Stacktrace:
